trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Trenton
There were no other sightings in Trenton on or around June 30th 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were driving home from a family reunion. a couple streets away from our home, i looked out of the windshield of our car. i saw a star-like object fly through the sky at approx. 50 mph. it flew for a few seconds at this amazing speed and then comepletly disappeared with no flash, no disinigration, no nothing. it simply disappeared. the fact that it simply disappeared rules out that is was shooting star or anything of the sort. it was too close to be a star and it was obviously in our atmosphere. my family all saw it and had no idea what it was but still deny that it was a ufo. now, a year later, this experience has lead to the start of my ufo investigation team. the trenton ohio ufo hunters. [web addresss moved to witness information section\tg] thank you for reading this.
